pages.text: The Duality Rings have two effects:$(br2)$(2)All arrow damage is increased.$(br2)$(5)Consuming Magic Garlic Bread grants Health Boost and Strength.

The Duality Rings support the following enchantments:$(br2)$(l)Curse of Chromatic Twisting$(): Magic Garlic Bread also grants Saturation for a brief duration, however not having this effect inflicts an unending Hunger effect
